items.content_html: I’m quitting Reddit for much the same reason I quit Twitter: both actively disdain and mistreat the users whose community and effort generates the profits motivating the ill-treatment. It’s a sick cycle that no amount of community is worth supporting. I don’t hope to change them. It’s for me.

A flea market find. When I told the vendor I kinda-sorta collect pencils, he was mystified. I showed him the pencils I happened to have in my case…and ended up trading him for a motley assortment of eight pencils (a couple of Blackwings, a couple of Tombows, and four Musgraves) and a well-used Sonic Rachetta sharpener. A great deal for me, and I may have brought someone into the pencil fold.

Apologies for the shadows. It’s hard to get a photo through the glass!
